an instrumental or vocal track that is combined with other tracks to produce a musical composition                                      
             
             Turner gives the track an air of familiarity with his lead vocal, which sits atop an instrumental bed dominated by an infectious, sweeping string section.

a musical soundtrack (as to a motion picture or television show)

definition: a piece of furniture that you sleep on, consisting of a soft comfortable part called a mattress and a base
anything that is used by a person or animal for sleeping on
the ground at the bottom of a sea or river
an area in a river, lake, or ocean where there are a lot of plants or animals of a particular kind
an area of ground that has been dug for growing plants and flowers
a layer of food on which you put other food
a layer of rock that is inside a larger area of rock
used to say you find someone sexually attractive
a bedroom. This meaning is only used in advertisements for houses.
in: double/single bed: The room had two single beds in it.
out of/in bed: It’s midnight – why aren’t you in bed?
get out of bed  (=get up): I never get out of bed before 10 am.
go to bed: I’ll get home at 11 pm and go straight to bed.
put someone to bed: Sam was upstairs putting the children to bed.
make the/my/your etc bed  (=tidy its covers after you have slept in it): Why can’t you kids make your own beds?
The dog’s bed is in the kitchen.
He made himself a bed of straw.
a dried-up river bed
fish that live close to the sea bed
reed beds
oyster beds
a circular bed in the middle of the lawn
bed of: prawns served on a bed of lettuce
get out of bed on the wrong side
go to bed with someone
good/bad in bed
someone has made their bed, and they must lie/sleep in it
jump/get into bed with someone
something/life is not a bed of roses
put something to bed

definition: a large, rectangular piece of furniture, often with four legs, used for sleeping on:
to make a bed neat after you have slept in it
the bottom of something, or something that serves as a base:
a pile of one type of food on which other food is arranged as a meal:
a piece of ground used for growing plants outside:
to put something firmly into a substance or into the ground:
to have sex with someone
abbreviation for Bachelor of Education: a degree taken by some teachers, or a person who has this degree
a large piece of furniture with a flat surface that a person can lie on to sleep or rest:
the bottom of a river, lake, or sea
an area of ground used for planting flowers:
in: He lived in a room with only two chairs, a bed, and a table.
He likes to have breakfast in bed on a Saturday morning.
She didn't get out of bed till lunchtime today.
I'm exhausted - I'm going to bed (= going to get into a bed in order to sleep).
I always put the children to bed (= make certain that they get into a bed and are comfortable there ready for going to sleep) at 7.30 p.m.
Many strange plants and fish live on the sea bed.
The railway was built on a bed of solid rock.
roasted vegetables on a bed of rice
They have some beautiful flower beds in their garden.
The posts should be firmly bedded in concrete.
He felt sick and decided to stay in bed that day.
He sat down on the bed and took off his shoes.
Some mornings it’s really hard to get out of bed.
I'm really tired – I think I'll go to bed (= get into bed in order to sleep).
a flower bed

definition: A bed is a miniature gravity well designed to trap unsuspecting victims in a warm, fluffy prison, from which there is no escape.

Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.
my favourite place
a matress on a stand or on the floor (lol) that has a blanket and pillows on it and u got to sleep on it coz sleep is so good

The most magical place in your house.I sleep eat and watch tv in my bed.14 year olds sometimes use it to hide nuddy magazines under the matrass.
